title: SalatBars
typeOfFood: Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Selection of salads including fresh veggies and greens. Has a juice bar and smoothies. Free Wi-Fi. Green themed indoor seating. Relocated from Krisjana Barona 40 in 2015.
streetAddress: T/c Riga Plaza - Mukusalas St 71; 1/c Olimpia - Azenes 5
